body.codeblock: <observation classCode="SPCOBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.57"/> <code code="67500-9" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" displayName="Airbag deployment NEMSIS"/> <value xsi:type="CD"/> </observation>
